infos.value: I'm sorry... I'm ashamed to have made promises I couldn't keep.
But there is no need to fret. I guarantee your safety.
From what I have heard, you have done Machérie a great service.
Hourne is indebted to—
Hourne has allied with our bitter enemy Fennes.
Our safety can never be guaranteed as long as that alliance with Fennes stands.
Please don't misunderstand. I'm not condemning you.
The only thing I want...is for you to save my mother.
Sterne, I...
I'll do as much as I can. I can promise that, at least. So—
I'd say it's about time you wrapped up this little conversation.
You are the shinobi in Fennes's employ?
I've heard tell of you. You're Rairyuu, if I'm not mistaken.
Gotta take these two. No hard feelings, right?
Let me ask one thing. Have you seen Shadowlynx?
Shadowlynx...?
Are the people of Gouga not sworn enemies of the shinobi of Saiga?
Rairyuu, these people are Hourne's honored guests. If there is any—
Who the hell do you think you are?
What...!?
Why should I take orders from the likes of you!?
You want something from me, it's going to cost you. So pay up.
I hate people like you, always trying to order me around without paying a single gil!
Why, you...
You should be careful how you speak to me, unless you want to end up like—
Like Lynx, you mean?
Heh heh heh... Who's to say?
